mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply_likes (br_id, u_id, status) VALUE (#{brId},#{uId},#{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE reply_likes SET status=#{status} WHERE u_id=#{uId} AND br_id=#{brId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reply_likes WHERE u_id=#{uId} AND br_id=#{brId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN status='LIKE' THEN 1 END ) 'like', COUNT(CASE WHEN status='BAD' THEN 1 END ) 'bad', COUNT(CASE WHEN status='BEST' THEN 1 END ) 'best', COUNT(CASE WHEN status='SAD' THEN 1 END ) 'sad' FROM reply_likes WHERE br_id=#{brId}
